accommodation.title: Queen Street Apartment
accommodation.description: Situated right in the heart of the city on Queen St. This compact yet functional two bedroom, one bathroom apartment boasts a bohemian chic feel which is hard to find! With natural light and an interior designers touch, this is a great place to call home while in Auckland.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Rimutaka Cycle Abode
accommodation.description: Rest, relax and soak in the abundant nature and peace of quiet of our beautiful house.Relax in our sunny lounge or living room, warm up by the cozy fire, sip a wine out on our sunny 270 degree deck and enjoy the views.

accommodation.title: Deluxe Private Studio
accommodation.description: Light and airy, modern studio conversion. Private en-suite bathroom and kitchenette. Wood paneled ceiling and floor giving a sleek modern look. The perfect space to relax or plan your next adventure.

accommodation.title: Executive Beach Retreat
accommodation.description: Wake to the sound of the waves lapping the shore as the sun streams in. Relax and take in the stunning views - this is a perfect oasis to relax in- or grab the kayaks and go out for a paddle.

accommodation.title: Twin Oars Apartment
accommodation.description: Twin Oars Is a ground floor apartment which has its own separate entrance. You have access to all the facilities in the apartment and are welcome to use the front garden and of course your apartment deck to relax on. Also feel free to pick an organic orange or walnuts from the trees, when is season.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Christchurch City Retreat
accommodation.description: Be dazzled in this award -winning, trendy, Luxury brand new home. The house is well appointed with a great kitchen centrally located in an open living and dining area and open up with big bi fold doors to its north facing deck!
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Grand Mercure Auckland
accommodation.description: Located in the heart of the Auckland waterfront district and surrounded by designer boutiques and award winning restaurants of Britomart, Grand Mercure Auckland embraces all of these elements to tell the story of our uniquely diverse city.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Sofitel Wellington
accommodation.description: Situated by the sea, this luxury hotel is within a 10-minute walk of New Zealand Parliament Buildings, St Paul's Cathedral, and Old St Paul's. Carter Observatory and Botanic Gardens are also within 1 mi (2 km). Wellington Station is 9 minutes by foot.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Sudima Christchurch Airport
accommodation.description: If you want to stretch your legs after your flight we’re just a few minutes walk away, or we can send our shuttle to pick you up. Our facilities include an in-house restaurant and bar, a gym, conference rooms, high-speed internet and a shuttle that runs 24/7.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Hilton Auckland
accommodation.description: Sleek rooms, gorgeous views, the perfect location - have it all at Hilton Auckland. Our waterfront hotel has sundecks, private balconies and walls of windows for views of the harbour you won't find anywhere else.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Naumi Auckland Airport
accommodation.description: Naumi Auckland Airport offers luxury accommodation with stylish rooms, surrounded by quiet gardens. A fitness centre and Asian-influenced restaurant are featured.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: QT Wellington Apartments
accommodation.description: Boasting magnificent artwork and located opposite Te Papa Museum, this stylish hotel features a restaurant, heated indoor pool and a day spa.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Qt Queenstown
accommodation.description: Views over the crystal clear Lake Wakatipu and breathtaking peaks of the Southern Alps set the scene at QT Queenstown. This lush lakeside resort features luxury accommodation with a side of the signature QT quirk.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.deal: 20% off local fast food stores (within a 2km radius).
accommodation.title: Adelphi Motel
accommodation.description: Adelphi Motel is located in Christchurch, 600 m from Victoria Street. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.5 km from Canterbury Museum, 1.7 km from Christchurch Arts Centre.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.deal: 20% off local fast food stores (within a 2km radius).
accommodation.title: Sumner Bay Motel
accommodation.description: Set in Christchurch, Sumner Bay Motel features free WiFi. The property is around 500 m from Sumner Beach, 12 km from Re:START and 13 km from Christchurch Arts Centre.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Ohtel Wellington
accommodation.description: Located within Wellington’s exclusive Oriental Bay neighbourhood, Ohtel offers luxurious accommodation with views of the Chaffers Marina. It features exquisitely designed bathrooms fitted with locally made natural toiletries.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Urbanz Christchurch
accommodation.description: Stay in the centre of Christchurch in our beautifully renovated loft style building - easy walk to all city sights. Huge guest kitchen and dining room.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Jucy Snooze Christchurch
accommodation.description: You’ll find JUCY Snooze Christchurch less than a 10 minute walk from both the International and Domestic Terminals at Christchurch Airport. But convenience doesn’t need to be boring!
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'><i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Trek Global Wellington
accommodation.description: Trek Global is the friendly, fun backpackers in the heart of Wellington. Whether you’re en route to an adrenaline driven destination or fancy a few days to explore the culture capital of NZ come and stay with us at Trek!
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'>

accommodation.title: Nomads Auckland
accommodation.description: Nomads Auckland Backpackers is located in a beautiful historic building in Auckland CBD and is within a 10-minute walk from Spark Arena, the Sky Tower and Viaduct Harbor. It’s a 5 minute walk to Britomart Train Station and Queen Street is just around the corner.
accommodation.rating: <i class='far fa-star'>
